channel.title: Help in runserver.bat +shop
channel.description: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 400" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1343 Client type: low memory version UserId: 96937517 Choover is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1348[/code] Thats an error coming up when i use runserver.bat , i just added a shop btw and it says something about shop to aswell so yea, its about what i added, which i want there and now when i try to join when server is up it just get blackscreened and nothing loads.

item.title: Help in runserver.bat +shop
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i know why it gave me errors in shops.cfg, i had some fun with a program i foound in download section, ShopMaker, and it made it be spaces instead of tabs thank you all for helping anyways.

Read full topic

Still happends[/quote]
now do it the same then with the number 23000

1 400 500
2 300 500

cause 1 space to much
